typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> clickstream
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> crm-database
clickstream, crm-database join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> MergeOnProductCampaignId
MergeOnProductCampaignId aggregate() ~> AggregateClickCount
AggregateClickCount filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> SelectTopProducts
SelectTopProducts sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> WriteOutPutClickCountCRMDatabase
